google_play_reviews.content: Works well, does a splendid job of getting me out of bed cause I put the qr code outside my room on the cover of a notebook and I have turn on the lights to scan giving me energy. My only Qualms with the app is the lack of scheduling cause you have to manually set the alarm which is an inconvenience and my cause people to forgot to set their alarm.

good app, but no saving/repeating alarms. i just woke up from oversleeping 4 hours because i forgot to hit the small "start" button on the alarm and it was bound to happen, having to manually put in the wakeup time every time I go to bed ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­

This app is incredible in theory... I printed out the QR code from the app but the camera in the app does not pick it up. It's a giant black barcode on white copy paper....I turn all the lights on in my apartment, make sure its on a flat surface, all the rest... it still wont pick it up. My regular camera will, but scanning it that way wont shut off the alarm. Also, the option to use a local sound file as the alarm doesn't work either.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hey, thank You for reporting! It would be great if You could provide more details on the problem: 1. Did the app not scan the code even if the code was more distant from the camera (1-2 meters)?, 2. When trying to set custom sound, did the app redirect You to the file picker screen? If so, what format was the selected audio file (mp3, wav etc.)?

google_play_reviews.content: You guys doing good improvments since beginning on barcodes usability, But i figure out one heavy sleeper can easily avoid alarms with volume down during the ringing, please fix that issue. Rest is good and simple minimalist ui, I would recommend heavy sleeper to try this with distant barcodes and qr code.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for the opinion and suggestion, we appreciate it!
